description: The Gutenberg Blocks and Page Layouts – Attire Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'attire-blocks/post-carousel' block in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

product.name: Gutenberg Blocks and Page Layouts – Attire Blocks
